summary: Configuration container for a multimodal punctuation and capitalization model that combines lexical text features with an audio encoder, exposing options to freeze the audio encoder, attach adapter modules, and extend the encoder with additional conformer layers.
business_intent: Enable users to fine‑tune or adapt a speech‑aware text normalization model for downstream applications such as automatic transcription post‑processing, voice assistants, or captioning services, by providing flexible training settings.
